Pre-Game Insights: Germany come into the tournament on the rise under coach Julian Nagelsmann.
Hungary has been unbeaten since September 2022, a run of 12 games.
Switzerland reached the quarter-finals in the last Euros, their best result at the competition.
Scotland will open the tournament against hosts Germany on June 14.
Italy, who triumphed against England to win Euro 2020, are a tough prospect despite their failure to reach the 2022 World Cup.
England are ready to make Euro 2024 headlines as the Group C favourites prepare to launch their bid for a first major trophy in 58 years.
